amendment.description: Page 277, line 4, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $10,000,000)". Page 320, line 7, after the first dollar amount, insert "(increased by $10,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 101 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase funding for Legal Services Corporation by $10 million, offset by a $10 million reduction to the increased amount allocated in the bill to the U.S. Marshals Service.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Cohen amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A105) offered by Mr. Cohen.
